import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Signup() { const [credentials,setcredentials] = useState({name:"",email:"",password:"",geolocation:""}) const handlesubmit= async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const response=fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/creatuser",{ method:'POST', headers:{ 'Content-Type':'application/json' }, body:JSON.stringify() }) } return ( <>
We'll never share your email with anyone else.

) } export default Signup
